sentences.sContent: Women seem to find him attractive .
sentences.sCn: 女性似乎觉得他很有吸引力。

sentences.sContent: ...size or age; whether a chain owned it; how attractive the neighborhood was—had no significant relationship to how the residents fared in terms of illness...
...has more attractive salaries and offers better prospects than the voluntary or public sectors...
...Television Television is an attractive medium for advertising because it delivers mass audiences to advertisers...

synos.tran: 吸引人的；有魅力的；引人注目的

words.tran: 迷人地；有吸引力地；动人地
吸引，吸引力；引力；吸引人的事物
[自] 吸引子；引起注意的人

trans.tranCn: 有吸引力的， 引起注意的
trans.tranOther: someone who is attractive is good looking, especially in a way that makes you sexually interested in them
